personal.name: Jesus Antonio Padres Parada
personal.title: Software Engineer & Founder
personal.bio: Full-stack engineer with 3+ years of experience designing and shipping SaaS applications for enterprise clients. Currently building solutions at Solvr Labs.

experience.title: Software Engineer

experience.title: Computer Science Tutor
experience.summary: Mentored students in core CS fundamentals and software engineering practices.

Help students debug code and understand error messages
Explain complex concepts using real-world analogies
Create practice problems and study materials
achievements: Helped dozens of students improve their grades
Developed teaching materials still used by tutoring center
Received consistently positive feedback from students

details.description: Strong foundation in multiple programming paradigms with production experience.

DevOps and infrastructure tooling for reliable software delivery.
Comprehensive testing strategies and debugging complex systems.
